snippet.title: StarVaders - Official Trailer | Publisher Spotlight 2024 (Joystick Ventures)
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay and more in this trailer for StarVaders, an upcoming mech-powered, grid-based, roguelike deckbuilder game. StarVaders will be available in 2025 on PC (via Steam).

StarVaders combines the emergent growth and fleet-footed thinking of deckbuilders with the positional and tactical considerations of grid-based strategy games. Pilot a mech and fend off the alien invasion of Earth by not just playing cards to attack, but by preventing the enemies from advancing too close in the atmosphere, lest the doom meter fill and damn humanity!
